alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Gabriel Mountains; Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 21 at 11:14PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...A line of strong showers and isolated thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Los Angeles County through 1145 PM PDT... At 1110 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong showers and isolated thunderstorms stretching from Monrovia south to El Monte. This line was moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down trees, tree limbs, and power lines, and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Glendora...West Covina...Pomona...Whittier...Baldwin Park...Azusa... El Monte...Arcadia...Sierra Madre...Monrovia...Claremont...Walnut... San Gabriel...Irwindale...and La Puente. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern San Gabriel Mountains; Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley
